sentences.sContent: Their candor is a very pleasing feature.
sentences.sContent_eng: Their candor is a very pleasing feature.
sentences.sCn: 他们的坦白是很愉快的特征。

sentences.sContent: He spared no one's feelings and expressed his views with great candor.
sentences.sContent_eng: He spared no one's feelings and expressed his views with great candor.
sentences.sCn: 他在不伤害他人的感情下，把自己的意见表示得很坦白。

remMethod.val: cand (白) + or (表状态) → 坦白
